comment: Value of subspace sum of two Hilbert space subspaces. Definition of subspace sum in [Kalmbach] p. 65. (Contributed by NM, 16-Oct-1999.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 23-Dec-2013.) (New usage is discouraged.)
